ComicInfo.Summary: Launch Day Part 2 of 2: Ed and Kelly pose as residents of Alibar to try to uncover the truth about Launch Day, while Malloy and LaMarr board the mysterious space satellite in orbit to determine if it is a threat. Meanwhile, on the Orville, Bortus must hold off an impatient Captain Kratok from launching a Krill attack against Alibar.
ComicInfo.Title: Launch Day Part 2 of 2
ComicInfo.Writer: David Goodman,David A. Goodman,David A. Goodman
